LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.Guenstiger
LocaleResource.Value: Allows you to export product data in the feed format of Guenstiger.de.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Feeds.GuenstigerProductCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product data in CSV feed format of Guenstiger.de.

LocaleResource.Name: DemoModeHint
LocaleResource.Value: Please take to account this plugin runs in demo mode and only 20 products will be exported. To buy a license for this plugin please visit the SmartStore Community Marketplace.

LocaleResource.Name: ShippingMethod0.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Shipping methods and costs to be exported.
